name: Classic French Press
description: A simple and robust method for full-bodied coffee.

steps.instruction: Add {coffeeAmount}g of coarse ground coffee to the French Press
Add {waterAmount}g of water and stir gently.
Place the lid on and wait 3 minutes 45 seconds.
Slowly press the plunger down and enjoy!

name: James Hoffmann's French Press Technique
description: A refined method that aims to reduce sediment in the final cup.

steps.instruction: Add {coffeeAmount}g of medium-fine ground coffee to the French Press.
Add {waterAmount}g of water in the French Press.
Wait for 4 minutes  for the coffee to bloom.
Stir the crust gently and scoop out the foam.
Wait for 5-8 minutes for the coffee to drawdown.
Slowly press the plunger just below the surface and pour carefully.

name: Gwilym Davies French Press recipe
description: French press recipe by Gwilym Davies, World barista champion and SCA authorized trainer.

steps.instruction: Grind the coffee and put it into French Press. Place on scale and zero it out.
Use a tablespoon to mix coffee with water.
Insert the plunger, but don't press it down yet.
Pour the coffee into the carafe and wait for another 2 minutes before serving.
